<a id="class_OptionButton"></a>

# OptionButton

**Inherits:** [Button](class_button.md) **<** [BaseButton](class_basebutton.md) **<** [Control](class_control.md) **<** [CanvasItem](class_canvasitem.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A button that brings up a dropdown with selectable options when pressed.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**OptionButton** is a type of button that brings up a dropdown with selectable items when pressed. The item selected becomes the "current" item and is displayed as the button text.

See also [BaseButton](class_basebutton.md) which contains common properties and methods associated with this node.

\ **Note:** The IDs used for items are limited to signed 32-bit integers, not the full 64 bits of [int](class_int.md). These have a range of ``-2^31`` to ``2^31 - 1``, that is, ``-2147483648`` to ``2147483647``.

\ **Note:** The [Button.text](class_button.md#class_Button_property_text) and [Button.icon](class_button.md#class_Button_property_icon) properties are set automatically based on the selected item. They shouldn't be changed manually.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Signals

<a id="class_OptionButton_signal_item_focused"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**item_focused**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_signal_item_focused)

Emitted when the user navigates to an item using the [ProjectSettings.input/ui_up](class_projectsettings.md#class_ProjectSettings_property_input/ui_up) or [ProjectSettings.input/ui_down](class_projectsettings.md#class_ProjectSettings_property_input/ui_down) input actions. The index of the item selected is passed as argument.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_signal_item_selected"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**item_selected**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_signal_item_selected)

Emitted when the current item has been changed by the user. The index of the item selected is passed as argument.

\ [allow_reselect](class_optionbutton.md#class_OptionButton_property_allow_reselect) must be enabled to reselect an item.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_OptionButton_property_allow_reselect"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **allow_reselect** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_property_allow_reselect)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_allow_reselect**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_allow_reselect**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the currently selected item can be selected again.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_property_fit_to_longest_item"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **fit_to_longest_item** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_property_fit_to_longest_item)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_fit_to_longest_item**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_fit_to_longest_item**\ (\ )

If ``true``, minimum size will be determined by the longest item's text, instead of the currently selected one's.

\ **Note:** For performance reasons, the minimum size doesn't update immediately when adding, removing or modifying items.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_property_item_count"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **item_count** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_property_item_count)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_item_count**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_item_count**\ (\ )

The number of items to select from.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_property_selected"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **selected** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_property_selected)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [int](class_int.md) **get_selected**\ (\ )

The index of the currently selected item, or ``-1`` if no item is selected.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_add_icon_item"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_icon_item**\ (\ texture\: [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md), label\: [String](class_string.md), id\: [int](class_int.md) = -1\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_add_icon_item)

Adds an item, with a `texture` icon, text `label` and (optionally) `id`. If no `id` is passed, the item index will be used as the item's ID. New items are appended at the end.

\ **Note:** The item will be selected if there are no other items.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_add_item"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_item**\ (\ label\: [String](class_string.md), id\: [int](class_int.md) = -1\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_add_item)

Adds an item, with text `label` and (optionally) `id`. If no `id` is passed, the item index will be used as the item's ID. New items are appended at the end.

\ **Note:** The item will be selected if there are no other items.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_add_separator"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_separator**\ (\ text\: [String](class_string.md) = ""\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_add_separator)

Adds a separator to the list of items. Separators help to group items, and can optionally be given a `text` header. A separator also gets an index assigned, and is appended at the end of the item list.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_clear"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_clear)

Clears all the items in the **OptionButton**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_get_item_auto_translate_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[AutoTranslateMode](class_node.md#enum_Node_AutoTranslateMode) **get_item_auto_translate_mode**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_get_item_auto_translate_mode)

Returns the auto translate mode of the item at index `idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_get_item_icon"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **get_item_icon**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_get_item_icon)

Returns the icon of the item at index `idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_get_item_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_item_id**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_get_item_id)

Returns the ID of the item at index `idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_get_item_index"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_item_index**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_get_item_index)

Returns the index of the item with the given `id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_get_item_metadata"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](class_variant.md) **get_item_metadata**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_get_item_metadata)

Retrieves the metadata of an item. Metadata may be any type and can be used to store extra information about an item, such as an external string ID.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_get_item_text"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](class_string.md) **get_item_text**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_get_item_text)

Returns the text of the item at index `idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_get_item_tooltip"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](class_string.md) **get_item_tooltip**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_get_item_tooltip)

Returns the tooltip of the item at index `idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_get_popup"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PopupMenu](class_popupmenu.md) **get_popup**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_get_popup)

Returns the [PopupMenu](class_popupmenu.md) contained in this button.

\ **Warning:** This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [Window.visible](class_window.md#class_Window_property_visible) property.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_get_selectable_item"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_selectable_item**\ (\ from_last\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_get_selectable_item)

Returns the index of the first item which is not disabled, or marked as a separator. If `from_last` is ``true``, the items will be searched in reverse order.

Returns ``-1`` if no item is found.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_get_selected_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_selected_id**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_get_selected_id)

Returns the ID of the selected item, or ``-1`` if no item is selected.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_get_selected_metadata"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](class_variant.md) **get_selected_metadata**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_get_selected_metadata)

Gets the metadata of the selected item. Metadata for items can be set using [set_item_metadata()](class_optionbutton.md#class_OptionButton_method_set_item_metadata).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_has_selectable_items"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **has_selectable_items**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_has_selectable_items)

Returns ``true`` if this button contains at least one item which is not disabled, or marked as a separator.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_is_item_disabled"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_item_disabled**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_is_item_disabled)

Returns ``true`` if the item at index `idx` is disabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_is_item_separator"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_item_separator**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_is_item_separator)

Returns ``true`` if the item at index `idx` is marked as a separator.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_remove_item"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_item**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_remove_item)

Removes the item at index `idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_select"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **select**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_select)

Selects an item by index and makes it the current item. This will work even if the item is disabled.

Passing ``-1`` as the index deselects any currently selected item.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_set_disable_shortcuts"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_disable_shortcuts**\ (\ disabled\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_set_disable_shortcuts)

If ``true``, shortcuts are disabled and cannot be used to trigger the button.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_set_item_auto_translate_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_auto_translate_mode**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md), mode\: [AutoTranslateMode](class_node.md#enum_Node_AutoTranslateMode)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_set_item_auto_translate_mode)

Sets the auto translate mode of the item at index `idx`.

Items use [Node.AUTO_TRANSLATE_MODE_INHERIT](class_node.md#class_Node_constant_AUTO_TRANSLATE_MODE_INHERIT) by default, which uses the same auto translate mode as the **OptionButton** itself.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_set_item_disabled"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_disabled**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md), disabled\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_set_item_disabled)

Sets whether the item at index `idx` is disabled.

Disabled items are drawn differently in the dropdown and are not selectable by the user. If the current selected item is set as disabled, it will remain selected.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_set_item_icon"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_icon**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md), texture\: [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_set_item_icon)

Sets the icon of the item at index `idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_set_item_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_id**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md), id\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_set_item_id)

Sets the ID of the item at index `idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_set_item_metadata"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_metadata**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md), metadata\: [Variant](class_variant.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_set_item_metadata)

Sets the metadata of an item. Metadata may be of any type and can be used to store extra information about an item, such as an external string ID.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_set_item_text"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_text**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md), text\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_set_item_text)

Sets the text of the item at index `idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_set_item_tooltip"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_tooltip**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md), tooltip\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_set_item_tooltip)

Sets the tooltip of the item at index `idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_method_show_popup"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **show_popup**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_method_show_popup)

Adjusts popup position and sizing for the **OptionButton**, then shows the [PopupMenu](class_popupmenu.md). Prefer this over using ``get_popup().popup()``.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="class_OptionButton_theme_constant_arrow_margin"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](class_int.md) **arrow_margin** = `4` [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_theme_constant_arrow_margin)

The horizontal space between the arrow icon and the right edge of the button.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_theme_constant_modulate_arrow"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](class_int.md) **modulate_arrow** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_theme_constant_modulate_arrow)

If different than ``0``, the arrow icon will be modulated to the font color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OptionButton_theme_icon_arrow"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **arrow** [ðŸ”—](#class_OptionButton_theme_icon_arrow)

The arrow icon to be drawn on the right end of the button.
